abstract: The head of Citigroup‘s Citi Private Equity unit is reportedly leaving the firm. John Barber, who heads Citi Private Equity, told Dow Jones in an e-mail message: “After 14 years at Citigroup and the last nine years leading Citi Private Equity, I will be leaving the firm.”
lead_paragraph: The head of Citigroup‘s Citi Private Equity unit is reportedly leaving the firm. John Barber, who heads Citi Private Equity, told Dow Jones in an e-mail message: “After 14 years at Citigroup and the last nine years leading Citi Private Equity, I will be leaving the firm.”

headline.main: Citigroup Private Equity Executive Said to Leave
